title: FS: T206 Joe Tinker Cycle 460 REDUCED
author: Shoele$$

posts.post_title: FS: T206 Joe Tinker Cycle 460 REDUCED
posts.post_content:
Hello all,

For sale is a hard to find HOFer T206 Joe Tinker "bat on shoulder" with the tough Cycle 460 back.  Graded 2.5 by GAI.  Has a couple tiny spots of paper loss on the front, but doesn't take away from the overall eye appeal.  An SGC 4 grade example just sold a little over a year ago for $4,300.  SGC has only graded two examples of this front/back combo, PSA has only graded one and GAI has only graded this one.  Definitely one of the scarcer combos in Tinker's T206 lineup.

Price for this beautiful example is $575 OBO shipped and fully insured via PayPal gift.  PM if interested.  Thanks

[IMG]http://i27.photobucket.com/albums/c182/grw1911/image-57.jpg[/IMG]

[IMG]http://i27.photobucket.com/albums/c182/grw1911/image-58.jpg[/IMG]
Reduced to sell....bump for the weekend.
